p.italic: Annexes are an optional element of the text.
For rules on the drafting of annexes, refer to the ISO/IEC Directives, Part 2:2018, Clause 20.

p.bold: To create new annexes, use the Insert Annex function in the ribbon above.

p.italic: • Specify whether the annex is normative or informative.
• All annexes need to be referred to at least once in the main body of the text.
• For an Annex to be considered normative, it needs to be referred to in a requirement in the main body of the text.
